[SC FR 221/2021, SC FR 225/2021 and SC F: the fact that the judgment of the High Court at Bar is partisan due to collusion between
one of the judges giving the majority judgment and an interested politician as revealed
the fact that the Court had not arrived at a correct conclusion in view of the affidavit
submitted by the driver of Bharatha Lakshman Premachandra referred to as "Bole" in
the  fact  that  one  of  the  judges  delivering  the  majority  judgment,  Hon.  M.  C.  B.  S.
Morais  had  simply  agreed  with  the  judgment  of  Hon.  Padmini  Ranawaka  without
analysing as to why he arrived at such a decision,
the fact that the verdict was divided.
